BetStop is a national self-exclusion register designed to protect consumers by allowing individuals to exclude themselves from all licensed Australian interactive wagering services. The system is applicable to all operators holding a license to offer online gambling services within Australia, ensuring a comprehensive approach to consumer protection.

== Covered Operators ==
BetStop covers all licensed Australian interactive wagering services. This includes a wide range of operators who are authorized to provide online betting services to Australian residents. The following table lists some of the major operators covered by BetStop:

== Services Not Covered ==
While BetStop provides extensive coverage for online wagering services, there are certain gambling services that are not included under this self-exclusion register:

* Land-based venues such as casinos and clubs
* Lotteries, including national and state lotteries
* Offshore gambling sites that are not licensed in Australia

These exclusions mean that individuals seeking to self-exclude from these types of gambling will need to pursue alternative measures.
